item.title: OpenShift Setup - GWT Tutorial - CodeTab
item.description: OpenShift OpenShift is a cloud computing platform as a service (PaaS) product from Red Hat. Unlike App Engine which restricts it self to select set of languages and databases, OpenShift gives you a wide range of choice programming languages including Java, Ruby, PHP, Node.js, Python and Perl. It supports variety of databases like MySQL, MangoDB, PostgreSQL etc., OpenShift also comes with a free account which allows you to host three applications.
